# H, W = map(int, input().split())
# h, w = map(int, input().split())
#
H, W = 3, 2
h, w = 2, 1

print(H*W - h*W - w*H + h*w)

# Get input
H, W = map(int, input().split())
h, w = map(int, input().split())
# Calculate number of white cells
print((H-h)*(W-w))

# Get input

print((H-h)*(W-w))

# Get input
H, W = map(int, input().split())
